prerequisite.name: Checking xTuple Edition
prerequisite.query: SELECT fetchMetricText('Application') = 'PostBooks';
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a PostBooks database.

prerequisite.name: Checking xTuple ERP database version
prerequisite.query: SELECT fetchMetricText('ServerVersion') IN ('4.0.0Beta2', '.4.0.0Beta2-4.0.0Beta3');
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a 4.0.0Beta2 PostBooks database.

prerequisite.name: Checking for empty country names and abbreviations
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM country WHERE country_abbr = '' OR country_name = '');
prerequisite.message: The country table has at least one record with a blank abbreviation or country name. Please update this table so all countries have their standard ISO abbreviations and a valid, unique name.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Characteristic names
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), char_name FROM "char" GROUP BY char_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The char table (characteristics) has duplicate values in the char_name column. Please check Products > Setup > Characteristics and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Address numbers
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), addr_number FROM addr GROUP BY addr_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The addr table has duplicate values in the addr_number column. Please remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate CSV Atlas mappings
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), atlasmap_name FROM atlasmap GROUP BY atlasmap_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The atlasmap table has duplicate values in the atlasmap_name column. Please check System > Setup > Import/Export > Import Settings > CSV Import Options and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Bank Account names
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), bankaccnt_name FROM bankaccnt GROUP BY bankaccnt_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The bankaccnt table has duplicate values in the bankaccnt_name column. Please check Accounting > Setup > Bank Accounts and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Bank Adjustment Types
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), bankadjtype_name FROM bankadjtype GROUP BY bankadjtype_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The bankadj table has duplicate values in the bankadjtype_name column. Please check Accounting > Setup > Bank Adjustment Types and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Budget names
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), budghead_name FROM budghead GROUP BY budghead_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The budghead table has duplicate values in the budghead_name column. Please check Accounting > Budget > List Budgets and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Calendar names
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), calhead_name FROM calhead GROUP BY calhead_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The calhead table has duplicate values in the calhead_name column. Please check System > Setup > Calendars and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Cash Receipt numbers
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), cashrcpt_number FROM cashrcpt GROUP BY cashrcpt_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The cashrcpt table has duplicate values in the cashrcpt_number column. Please remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Class Codes
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), classcode_code FROM classcode GROUP BY classcode_code HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The classcode table has duplicate values in the classcode_code column. Please check Products > Setup > Class Codes and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Credit Memo numbers
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), cmhead_number FROM cmhead GROUP BY cmhead_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The cmhead table has duplicate values in the cmhead_number column. Please remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Comment Type names

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Sites
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(*), warehous_code FROM whsinfo GROUP BY warehous_code HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);
prerequisite.message: The whsinfo table has duplicate values in the warehous_code column. Please check Inventory > Site > List and remove or change these duplicates before upgrading.
